```js
  <NoteContent
    note="F2"
    noteType="pitch"
    showEnharmonics
  />
```

```js
  <NoteContent
    note="F#2"
    noteType="pitch"
    showEnharmonics
  />
```

```js
  <NoteContent
    note="F#2"
    noteType="pitch"
    showEnharmonics={false}
  />
```
